name: Has Access Of Users Section
details: This will allow user see the link of user section.

name: Can Create Users
details: This will allow user to add anything in the user section.

name: Can Read Users
details: This will allow user to view anything in the user section.

name: Can Update Users
details: This will allow user to edit anything in the user section.

name: Can Delete Users
details: This will allow user to delete anything in the user section.

name: Can Manage Users
details: This will allow user to manage anything in the user section.

name: Can See Users Contact Details
details: This will allow user to view contact (email, mobile) detail in the user section.

name: Has Access Of Registrations Section
details: This will allow user see the link of registration section.

name: Can Create Registrations
details: This will allow user to add anything in the registration section.

name: Can Create Users From Registrations
details: This will allow user to add users in the registration section.

name: Can Read Registrations
details: This will allow user to view anything in the registration section.

name: Can Update Registrations
details: This will allow user to edit anything in the registration section.

name: Can Delete Registrations
details: This will allow user to delete anything in the registration section.

name: Can Manage Registrations
details: This will allow user to manage anything in the registration section.

name: Can See Registrations Contact Details
details: This will allow user to view contact detail in the registration section.

name: Has Access Of Roles Section
details: This will allow user see the link of role section.

name: Can Create Roles
details: This will allow user to add anything in the role section.

name: Can Read Roles
details: This will allow user to view anything in the role section.

name: Can Update Roles
details: This will allow user to edit anything in the role section.

name: Can Delete Roles
details: This will allow user to delete anything in the role section.

name: Can Manage Roles
details: This will allow user to manage anything in the role section.

name: Has Access Of Permissions Section
details: This will allow user see the link of permission section.

name: Can Read Permissions
details: This will allow user to view anything in the permission section.

name: Can Update Permissions
details: This will allow user to edit anything in the permission section.

name: Can Manage Permissions
details: This will allow user to manage anything in the permission section.
